home.title: StoryShot ‚Äì One-line Instagram story card maker
home.subtitle: Pick a photo or background and write a line for today. Create story cards for Instagram stories, KakaoTalk profile, or blog thumbnails.
home.introShort: StoryShot is a free tool to create one-line story cards for Instagram, KakaoTalk, and blog thumbnails and save them as PNG. Your text and photos are never sent to a server.
home.tips1: Use 9:16 ratio for Instagram stories and reels.
home.tips2: With a photo background, use the "Darken background" slider to improve text readability.
home.tips3: Saved PNGs don't include the width handle or color UI‚Äîjust the final card.
home.howToUseStep1: In the left form, enter your one-line, optional subtext, and date. Choose your mood (calm / good / tired / focused), or add a custom mood phrase or emoji.
home.howToUseStep2: Choose a gradient or photo background. For photos, use the darken slider for text readability and pick a card ratio (9:16, 4:5, 1:1, etc.).
home.howToUseStep3: On the preview card, drag text blocks to move them and click to change color. Drag the width handle (‚ñê) on the right to adjust text width.
home.howToUseStep4: When you're happy with it, click "Save card as PNG" to download. The saved image does not include the width handle or color UI.
home.uploadHint: Any image works: portraits, landscapes, screenshots, etc.

home.overlayHint: Higher values add a darker overlay so text is easier to read.

home.aboutBody: StoryShot is a web tool that lets you create one-line story cards for Instagram stories, KakaoTalk profile photos, blog thumbnails, and more, then save them as PNG. Everything runs in your browser; your text and uploaded images are never sent to any server.
home.faqQ1: Where can I use the saved image?
home.faqA1: You can use it anywhere: Instagram stories, KakaoTalk profile, blog thumbnails, social posts, etc. Commercial use is fine.
home.faqQ2: Is my data stored on a server?
home.faqA2: No. This page runs entirely in your browser. Your one-line text, subtext, and uploaded photos are not sent to any server. Only when you click "Save card as PNG" does a file download to your device.
home.faqQ3: Can I change the card ratio?
home.faqA3: Yes. You can choose from 9:16 (story), 4:5, 1:1 (square), 3:2, 16:9, and other ratios in the card ratio section.
home.faqQ4: Can I move the text or change its color?
home.faqA4: Yes. On the preview card, drag a text block to move it and click it to change the text color. You can also drag the width handle (‚ñê) on the right to adjust the text width.
home.faqQ5: Can I use it on mobile?
home.faqA5: Yes. The site works in mobile browsers. Editing the card may be easier on a computer.
home.faqA6: Yes. StoryShot is free to use.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Body: StoryShot ("the Service") values your privacy. This policy describes what information is collected, used, and protected when you use the Service. The Service runs in your browser; text and images you enter or upload for card creation are not sent to our servers and are processed only on your device.
privacy.section2Body: The Service processes the title, text, date, mood, and background images you provide only in your browser (client-side). This data is not stored on our servers. If you use the gallery share feature, the image and caption (title and content) you choose may be stored in infrastructure we use (e.g. Supabase) for the purpose of displaying them in the public gallery.
privacy.section3Body: The Service may use cookies or local storage when you visit, for example to remember your language preference. This site may also include third-party advertising services such as Google AdSense, which may use cookies and device identifiers to serve and measure ads. Google's privacy policy is available at https://policies.google.com/privacy.
privacy.section4Body: This site may display ads via Google AdSense. AdSense may use cookies to show relevant ads and to measure ad performance. Data collected or processed through AdSense is subject to Google's privacy policy. You can opt out of personalized ads in Google ad settings.
privacy.section5Body: Data you enter for card creation is not stored on our servers; once you leave the page or close the browser, it is not retained. Images and captions shared to the gallery may be kept for operational purposes; you may contact the operator to request deletion.
privacy.section6Body: For questions or requests regarding privacy, please use the contact information provided in the Terms of Service or About page. This policy may be updated as needed; changes will be announced on the Service.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Body: StoryShot ("the Service") provides a web tool that lets you create story cards in your browser and save them as PNG for use on Instagram stories, KakaoTalk profile, blog thumbnails, and similar. The Service is provided "as is" and is free to use.
terms.section2Body: You must use the Service in compliance with applicable laws and public order. You are responsible for the content of the cards you create. You must not upload or share content that infringes others' copyright, portrait rights, or reputation. The operator may remove content or restrict use when inappropriate use is identified.
terms.section3Body: Rights in the Service itself (design, logo, text, etc.) belong to the provider. Rights in the card images you create and the text and images they contain belong to you; you may use your cards freely for personal or commercial purposes.
terms.section4Body: The Service is intended for use in a browser environment. We are not liable for interruptions, errors, or data loss. Content shared in the gallery is posted by third parties; the provider does not guarantee its accuracy or legality. You are responsible for any disputes arising from content you upload or share.
terms.section5Body: We may update these terms when necessary. Updated terms will be posted on the Service with the revised date. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms. For inquiries, please refer to the Privacy Policy or About page.
